This file is a merged representation of the entire codebase, combined into a single document by Repomix.

================================================================
File Summary
================================================================

Purpose:
--------
This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.
It is designed to be easily consumable by AI systems for analysis, code review,
or other automated processes.

File Format:
------------
The content is organized as follows:
1. This summary section
2. Repository information
3. Directory structure
4. Multiple file entries, each consisting of:
  a. A separator line (================)
  b. The file path (File: path/to/file)
  c. Another separator line
  d. The full contents of the file
  e. A blank line

Usage Guidelines:
-----------------
- This file should be treated as read-only. Any changes should be made to the
  original repository files, not this packed version.
- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.
- Be aware that this file may contain sensitive information. Handle it with
  the same level of security as you would the original repository.

Notes:
------
- Some files may have been excluded based on .gitignore rules and Repomix's configuration
- Binary files are not included in this packed representation. Please refer to the Repository Structure section for a complete list of file paths, including binary files
- Files matching patterns in .gitignore are excluded
- Files matching default ignore patterns are excluded

Additional Info:
----------------

================
File: .github/workflows/deploy.yml
================
name: Deploy to S3

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

jobs:
  deploy:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Configure AWS credentials
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v1
        with:
          aws-access-key-id: ${{ secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID }}
          aws-secret-access-key: ${{ secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY }}
          aws-region: ${{ secrets.AWS_REGION }}

      - name: Set up Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version-file: '.nvmrc'
          cache: 'npm'

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      - name: Build site
        run: npm run build

      - name: Upload dist/ to S3
        run: aws s3 sync dist/ s3://rightspend.ai/ --acl public-read

      - name: Invalidate CloudFront
        run: |
          aws cloudfront create-invalidation \
            --distribution-id ${{ secrets.CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID }} \
            --paths "/*"

================
File: fix-paths.js
================
const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');

function fixPaths() {
  const distDir = path.join(__dirname, 'dist');
  const files = fs.readdirSync(distDir).filter(file => file.endsWith('.html'));

  files.forEach(file => {
    const filePath = path.join(distDir, file);
    let content = fs.readFileSync(filePath, 'utf8');

    // Replace path references
    content = content
      .replace(/\.\.\/styles\/input\.css/g, '/css/styles.css')
      .replace(/\.\/styles\/styles\.css/g, '/css/styles.css')
      .replace(/\.\/components\//g, '/components/')
      .replace(/\/components\//g, '/components/')
      .replace(/\/src\/components\//g, '/components/')
      .replace(/\/assets\/assets\//g, '/assets/')
      .replace(/\/assets\/assets\/images\//g, '/assets/images/')
      .replace(/\.\.\/assets\/images\//g, '/assets/images/')
      .replace(/\.\/assets\/images\//g, '/assets/images/')
      .replace(/\/src\/assets\/images\//g, '/assets/images/')
      .replace(/\/images\//g, '/assets/images/')
      .replace(/\.\.\/scripts\//g, '/scripts/')
      .replace(/\.\/scripts\//g, '/scripts/')
      .replace(/\/src\/scripts\//g, '/scripts/')
      .replace(/\.\/pages\//g, '/')
      .replace(/\/src\/pages\//g, '/');

    // Cleanup double asset paths
    content = content.replace(/\/assets\/assets\//g, '/assets/');

    fs.writeFileSync(filePath, content);
    console.log(`✅ Processed ${file}`);
  });
}

try {
  fixPaths();
  console.log('✅ fix-paths.js finished');
} catch (err) {
  console.error('❌ fix-paths.js failed:', err);
  process.exit(1);
}

================
File: package.json
================
{
  "name": "rightspend-landing",
  "version": "2.0.0",
  "description": "RightSpend multi-page website",
  "scripts": {
    "clean": "rimraf ./dist",
    "mkdir": "mkdirp dist/css dist/components dist/assets dist/scripts",
    "build:css": "tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/input.css -o ./dist/css/styles.css --minify",
    "copy:pages": "copyfiles -f src/pages/*.html dist",
    "copy:components": "copyfiles -f src/components/*.html dist/components",
    "copy:assets": "copyfiles -u 1 src/assets/**/* dist",
    "copy:scripts": "copyfiles -f src/scripts/**/* dist/scripts",
    "copy:static": "copyfiles -f static/* dist",
    "build:copy": "npm-run-all copy:pages copy:components copy:assets copy:scripts copy:static",
    "fix-paths": "node fix-paths.js",
    "build": "npm-run-all clean mkdir build:css build:copy fix-paths",
    "deploy": "npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/ s3://rightspend.ai/ --acl public-read",
    "serve": "node server.js"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.17",
    "copyfiles": "^2.4.1",
    "mkdirp": "^3.0.1",
    "npm-run-all": "^4.1.5",
    "postcss": "^8.4.35",
    "rimraf": "^5.0.5",
    "tailwindcss": "^3.4.1"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.21.2"
  }
}

================
File: README.md
================
# RightSpend Landing Page

The official landing page for RightSpend, showcasing our AWS cost optimization services.

## Quick Start

1. Install Node.js (v22.14.0 or later)
2. Install dependencies: `npm install`
3. Build the site: `npm run build`
4. Start the server: `npm run serve`

The site will be available at http://localhost:3005

## Development

- `npm run build` - Build the site (cleans dist, builds CSS, copies files)
- `npm run serve` - Start the local server
- `npm run clean` - Clean the dist directory

## Project Structure

```
rightspend.ai/
├── src/
│   ├── pages/         # HTML pages
│   ├── components/    # Reusable HTML components
│   ├── scripts/       # JavaScript files
│   ├── styles/        # CSS files (Tailwind)
│   └── assets/        # Images and other static files
├── dist/             # Built files (generated)
└── server.js        # Express server for serving the site
```

## Technologies

- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Alpine.js for interactivity
- Express.js for serving the site

## Menu Structure

*   Features
*   Benefits (with Use Cases as a sub-item)
*   Pricing
*   Resources
    *   How it Works
        *   Engine
        *   Admin Panel
    *   Use Cases
    *   FAQ
    *   Blog

================
File: server.js
================
const express = require('express');
const path = require('path');
const fs = require('fs');
const app = express();
const port = process.env.PORT || 3005;

// Serve static files from 'dist' directory
app.use(express.static(path.join(__dirname, 'dist'), {
    extensions: ['html', 'htm'],
    index: 'index.html'
}));

// Serve static files from the root directory
app.use(express.static(__dirname, {
    extensions: ['html', 'htm', 'xml'],
    index: 'index.html'
}));

// Handle all routes
app.get('*', (req, res) => {
    let filePath = path.join(__dirname, 'dist', req.path.replace(/^\//, ''));
    
    // Check if the file exists in the 'dist' directory
    if (fs.existsSync(filePath)) {
        if (fs.statSync(filePath).isDirectory()) {
            filePath = path.join(filePath, 'index.html');
        }
        res.sendFile(filePath);
        return;
    }

    // If not found in 'dist', check the root directory
    filePath = path.join(__dirname, req.path.replace(/^\//, ''));
    if (fs.existsSync(filePath)) {
        if (fs.statSync(filePath).isDirectory()) {
            filePath = path.join(filePath, 'index.html');
        }
        res.sendFile(filePath);
        return;
    }
    
    // If file doesn't exist, send 404
    res.status(404).sendFile(path.join(__dirname, 'dist', '404.html'));
});

app.listen(port, () => {
    console.log(`Server running on port ${port}`);
});

================
File: src/assets/css/input.css
================
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

@layer base {
  html {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
  }
  
  body {
    @apply antialiased text-gray-800;
  }

  h1 {
    @apply text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold;
  }

  h2 {
    @apply text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold;
  }

  h3 {
    @apply text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold;
  }

  h4 {
    @apply text-xl font-bold;
  }
}

@layer components {
  .container {
    @apply max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8;
  }

  .btn {
    @apply inline-flex items-center justify-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent rounded-lg font-semibold transition-all duration-200;
  }

  .btn-primary {
    @apply btn bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500;
  }

  .btn-secondary {
    @apply btn bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-secondary-500;
  }

  .btn-outline {
    @apply btn border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500;
  }

  .card {
    @apply bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 transition duration-300 hover:shadow-xl;
  }

  .input {
    @apply w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent;
  }
}

@layer utilities {
  .text-gradient {
    @apply bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary;
  }
}

================
File: src/assets/js/main.js
================
// Main JavaScript file for RightSpend website

// Initialize Alpine.js components
document.addEventListener('alpine:init', () => {
    // Calculator Component
    Alpine.data('calculator', () => ({
        monthlySpend: '',
        coverageType: 'none',
        calculating: false,
        savings: 0,
        savingsRate: 35,
        error: '',
        chart: null,

        setCoverageType(type) {
            this.coverageType = type;
            if (type === 'none') this.savingsRate = 35;
            if (type === 'savings-plan') this.savingsRate = 25;
            if (type === 'reserved') this.savingsRate = 20;
        },

        formatNumber(num) {
            return new Intl.NumberFormat().format(Math.round(num));
        },

        async calculate() {
            this.error = '';
            
            if (!this.monthlySpend || this.monthlySpend <= 0) {
                this.error = 'Please enter a valid monthly spend amount';
                return;
            }

            this.calculating = true;
            
            // Simulate API call
            await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1500));
            
            this.savings = this.monthlySpend * (this.savingsRate / 100);
            this.calculating = false;

            // Create chart after calculation
            this.$nextTick(() => {
                this.createChart();
            });
        },

        createChart() {
            if (this.chart) {
                this.chart.destroy();
            }

            const ctx = this.$refs.savingsChart.getContext('2d');
            this.chart = new Chart(ctx, {
                type: 'bar',
                data: {
                    labels: ['Current Cost', 'With RightSpend'],
                    datasets: [{
                        data: [
                            this.monthlySpend * 12,
                            (this.monthlySpend * 12) - (this.savings * 12)
                        ],
                        backgroundColor: ['#4A69B1', '#7C3AED'],
                        borderWidth: 0
                    }]
                },
                options: {
                    responsive: true,
                    plugins: {
                        legend: {
                            display: false
                        }
                    },
                    scales: {
                        y: {
                            beginAtZero: true,
                            ticks: {
                                callback: function(value) {
                                    return '$' + new Intl.NumberFormat().format(value);
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            });
        }
    }));

    // Testimonials Component
    Alpine.data('testimonialSlider', () => ({
        currentIndex: 0,
        testimonials: [
            {
                quote: "RightSpend has transformed how we manage our AWS costs. The flexibility and automated optimization have helped us achieve significant savings without any long-term commitments.",
                author: "Sarah Chen",
                title: "Cloud Infrastructure Manager",
                company: "TechCorp Solutions",
                avatar: "/assets/testimonials/avatar-1.jpg"
            },
            {
                quote: "The ability to optimize our AWS spend while maintaining complete flexibility has been game-changing. RightSpend's automated approach takes the guesswork out of cost optimization.",
                author: "Michael Rodriguez",
                title: "Director of Cloud Operations",
                company: "DataFlow Systems",
                avatar: "/assets/testimonials/avatar-2.jpg"
            },
            {
                quote: "We've seen a 45% reduction in our AWS costs since implementing RightSpend. The best part is the zero-risk approach - we only pay for actual savings achieved.",
                author: "Emily Watson",
                title: "VP of Engineering",
                company: "CloudScale Inc",
                avatar: "/assets/testimonials/avatar-3.jpg"
            }
        ],

        prev() {
            this.currentIndex = this.currentIndex === 0 
                ? this.testimonials.length - 1 
                : this.currentIndex - 1;
        },

        next() {
            this.currentIndex = this.currentIndex === this.testimonials.length - 1 
                ? 0 
                : this.currentIndex + 1;
        },

        init() {
            // Auto-advance every 5 seconds
            setInterval(() => {
                if (!document.hidden) {
                    this.next();
                }
            }, 5000);
        }
    }));
});

// Initialize global functionality
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    // Initialize AOS (Animate on Scroll)
    AOS.init({
        duration: 800,
        once: true,
        offset: 100
    });

    // Handle smooth scrolling for anchor links
    document.querySelectorAll('a[href^="#"]').forEach(anchor => {
        anchor.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            e.preventDefault();
            const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
            if (target) {
                target.scrollIntoView({
                    behavior: 'smooth',
                    block: 'start'
                });
            }
        });
    });
});

================
File: src/components/header.html
================
<header id="header" class="bg-white shadow-lg fixed w-full top-0 z-50">
    <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
        <div class="flex justify-between items-center h-20">
            <!-- Logo -->
            <a href="/" class="flex items-center">
                <img src="/assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png" alt="RightSpend Logo" class="h-8 mr-2">
                <span class="text-2xl font-bold text-primary">RightSpend</span>
            </a>

            <!-- Desktop Navigation -->
            <div class="hidden md:flex items-center space-x-8">
                <a href="/pages/features.html" class="text-gray-600 hover:text-primary transition">Features</a>
                <a href="/pages/benefits.html" class="text-gray-600 hover:text-primary transition">Benefits</a>
                <a href="/pages/use-cases.html" class="text-gray-600 hover:text-primary transition">Use Cases</a>
                <a href="/pages/pricing.html" class="text-gray-600 hover:text-primary transition">Pricing</a>
                <div class="relative" x-data="{ resourcesOpen: false }">
                    <button @click="resourcesOpen = !resourcesOpen" class="text-gray-600 hover:text-primary transition flex items-center space-x-2">
                        <span>Resources</span>
                        <svg class="fill-current h-4 w-4" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20"><path d="M9.293 12.95l.707.707L15.657 8l-1.414-1.414L10 10.828 5.757 6.586 4.343 8z"/></svg>
                    </button>
                    <div x-show="resourcesOpen" @click.away="resourcesOpen = false" class="absolute left-0 mt-2 w-48 bg-white rounded-md shadow-lg py-1 ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5">
                        <a href="/pages/how-it-works.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">How It Works</a>
                        <a href="/pages/engine.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 pl-8">Engine</a>
                        <a href="/pages/admin-panel.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 pl-8">Admin Panel</a>
                        <a href="/pages/use-cases.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Use Cases</a>
                        <a href="/pages/faq.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">FAQ</a>
                        <a href="/pages/blog.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Blog</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Mobile Menu Button and Menu (consolidated Alpine.js state) -->
            <div class="md:hidden" x-data="{ isOpen: false, benefitsOpen: false, resourcesOpen: false }">
                <button @click="isOpen = !isOpen" class="text-gray-600 hover:text-primary focus:outline-none">
                    <svg x-show="!isOpen" class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16"></path>
                    </svg>
                    <svg x-show="isOpen" class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                        <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12"></path>
                    </svg>
                </button>

                <!-- Mobile Menu -->
                <div x-show="isOpen" 
                     @click.away="isOpen = false"
                     x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
                     x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 transform scale-95"
                     x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 transform scale-100"
                     x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
                     x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 transform scale-100"
                     x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 transform scale-95"
                     class="absolute right-0 mt-2 w-48 bg-white rounded-md shadow-lg py-1 ring-1 ring-black ring-opacity-5">
                    <a href="/pages/features.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Features</a>
                    <a href="/pages/benefits.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Benefits</a>
                    <a href="/pages/use-cases.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Use Cases</a>
                    <a href="/pages/pricing.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Pricing</a>
                    <div>
                        <button @click="resourcesOpen = !resourcesOpen" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 w-full text-left">
                            Resources
                            <svg class="fill-current h-4 w-4 inline-block" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 20 20">
                                <path d="M9.293 12.95l.707.707L15.657 8l-1.414-1.414L10 10.828 5.757 6.586 4.343 8z" />
                            </svg>
                        </button>
                        <div x-show="resourcesOpen" class="pl-4">
                            <a href="/pages/how-it-works.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">How It Works</a>
                            <a href="/pages/engine.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 pl-8">Engine</a>
                            <a href="/pages/admin-panel.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100 pl-8">Admin Panel</a>
                            <a href="/pages/faq.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">FAQ</a>
                            <a href="/pages/blog.html" class="block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-100">Blog</a>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</header>
<!-- Spacer to prevent content from hiding under fixed header -->
<div class="h-32"></div>

================
File: src/components/testimonials.html
================
<div class="testimonials bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-8" x-data="testimonialSlider">
    <div class="text-center mb-12">
        <h3 class="text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold mb-4">What Our Customers Say</h3>
        <p class="text-gray-600">Learn how RightSpend is helping companies optimize their AWS costs</p>
    </div>

    <div class="relative">
        <!-- Testimonial Slides -->
        <div class="overflow-hidden">
            <template x-for="(testimonial, index) in testimonials" :key="index">
                <div x-show="currentIndex === index"
                     x-transition:enter="transition duration-300 ease-out"
                     x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 transform translate-x-4"
                     x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 transform translate-x-0"
                     x-transition:leave="transition duration-300 ease-in"
                     x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 transform translate-x-0"
                     x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 transform -translate-x-4"
                     class="testimonial-slide">
                    
                    <!-- Testimonial Content -->
                    <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto text-center">
                        <div class="mb-8">
                            <svg class="w-12 h-12 mx-auto text-gray-400" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                                <path d="M14.017 21v-7.391c0-5.704 3.731-9.57 8.983-10.609l.995 2.151c-2.432.917-3.995 3.638-3.995 5.849h4v10h-9.983zm-14.017 0v-7.391c0-5.704 3.748-9.57 9-10.609l.996 2.151c-2.433.917-3.996 3.638-3.996 5.849h3.983v10h-9.983z"/>
                            </svg>
                        </div>
                        <blockquote class="text-xl md:text-2xl text-gray-800 mb-8" x-text="testimonial.quote"></blockquote>
                        <div class="flex items-center justify-center space-x-4">
                            <div class="w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-primary text-white flex items-center justify-center text-lg font-semibold" x-text="testimonial.author.split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('')"></div>
                            <div class="text-left">
                                <div class="font-semibold" x-text="testimonial.author"></div>
                                <div class="text-gray-600" x-text="testimonial.title"></div>
                                <div class="text-primary" x-text="testimonial.company"></div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </template>
        </div>

        <!-- Navigation Arrows -->
        <div class="absolute inset-y-0 left-0 flex items-center">
            <button @click="prev" 
                    class="p-2 rounded-full bg-white shadow-lg text-gray-800 hover:text-primary transition transform -translate-x-4"
                    aria-label="Previous testimonial">
                <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M15 19l-7-7 7-7"/>
                </svg>
            </button>
        </div>
        <div class="absolute inset-y-0 right-0 flex items-center">
            <button @click="next"
                    class="p-2 rounded-full bg-white shadow-lg text-gray-800 hover:text-primary transition transform translate-x-4"
                    aria-label="Next testimonial">
                <svg class="w-6 h-6" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M9 5l7 7-7 7"/>
                </svg>
            </button>
        </div>

        <!-- Navigation Dots -->
        <div class="flex justify-center mt-8 space-x-2">
            <template x-for="(testimonial, index) in testimonials" :key="index">
                <button @click="currentIndex = index"
                        :class="currentIndex === index ? 'bg-primary' : 'bg-gray-300'"
                        class="w-3 h-3 rounded-full transition-colors duration-200"
                        :aria-label="'Go to testimonial ' + (index + 1)"></button>
            </template>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

================
File: src/pages/404.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Page Not Found - RightSpend</title>
    <meta name="description" content="The page you're looking for could not be found.">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="../assets/images/favicon.svg">

    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- 404 Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6 text-center">
            <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                <h1 class="text-6xl md:text-8xl font-bold text-primary mb-8">404</h1>
                <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold mb-8">Page Not Found</h2>
                <p class="text-xl text-gray-600 mb-12">The page you're looking for could not be found. It might have been moved or deleted.</p>
                <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-center gap-4">
                    <a href="/" class="btn-primary text-lg">Return Home</a>
                    <a href="/features" class="btn-outline text-lg">Explore Features</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Initialize AOS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.js"></script>
    <link href="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            AOS.init({
                duration: 800,
                once: true
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: src/pages/admin-panel.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" class="scroll-smooth">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend Admin Panel - Configuration</title>
    
    <!-- SEO Meta Tags -->
    <meta name="description" content="RightSpend admin configuration panel for AWS cost optimization settings.">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">
    
    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    
    <!-- Scripts -->
    <script defer src="https://unpkg.com/alpinejs@3.x.x/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: './components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="relative bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary overflow-hidden py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto text-center text-white">
                <h1 class="text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold mb-8" data-aos="fade-up">
                    RightSpend Configuration
                </h1>
                <p class="text-xl md:text-2xl mb-12" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
                    Configure RightSpend settings for optimal AWS cost optimization.
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- Decorative elements -->
        <div class="absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden pointer-events-none">
            <div class="absolute top-0 right-0 w-1/2 h-1/2 bg-white opacity-5 rounded-full transform translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2"></div>
            <div class="absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-1/3 h-1/3 bg-white opacity-5 rounded-full transform -translate-x-1/2 translate-y-1/2"></div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Main Content -->
    <main class="max-w-7xl mx-auto py-12 sm:px-6 lg:px-8" x-data="{ activeTab: 'common' }">
        <div class="container mx-auto">
            
            <div class="bg-white shadow-sm rounded-lg p-6 mb-8">
                <p class="text-gray-600">This is a sample configuration page that shows the available options for RightSpend. These settings are typically configured during initial setup and adjusted infrequently. Each option has been carefully designed to give you control over RightSpend's behavior while maintaining safe defaults.</p>
            </div>
            
            <!-- Tab Navigation -->
            <div class="border-b border-gray-200 mb-6">
                <nav class="-mb-px flex space-x-8">
                    <button @click="activeTab = 'common'" 
                            :class="{'border-primary text-primary': activeTab === 'common', 'border-transparent text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:border-gray-300': activeTab !== 'common'}"
                            class="whitespace-nowrap py-4 px-1 border-b-2 font-medium text-sm">
                        Common Parameters
                    </button>
                    <button @click="activeTab = 'region'" 
                            :class="{'border-primary text-primary': activeTab === 'region', 'border-transparent text-gray-500 hover:text-gray-700 hover:border-gray-300': activeTab !== 'region'}"
                            class="whitespace-nowrap py-4 px-1 border-b-2 font-medium text-sm">
                        Per-Region Parameters
                    </button>
                </nav>
            </div>

            <!-- Common Parameters -->
            <div x-show="activeTab === 'common'" class="space-y-6">
                <div class="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-lg">
                    <div class="px-4 py-5 sm:p-6 space-y-6">
                        <!-- AllowedRegions -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Allowed Regions</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <select multiple class="mt-1 block w-full pl-3 pr-10 py-2 text-base border-gray-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm rounded-md">
                                    <option>us-east-1</option>
                                    <option>us-east-2</option>
                                    <option>us-west-1</option>
                                    <option>us-west-2</option>
                                    <option>eu-west-1</option>
                                </select>
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Specifies the list of AWS regions where RightSpend is permitted to modify cRIs.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- AllowedAccounts -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Allowed Accounts</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <textarea rows="3" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md"></textarea>
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Specifies the list of AWS accounts where RightSpend is permitted to modify cRIs.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- AllowLongDeferral -->
                        <div class="relative flex items-start">
                            <div class="flex items-center h-5">
                                <input type="checkbox" class="focus:ring-blue-500 h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 border-gray-300 rounded">
                            </div>
                            <div class="ml-3 text-sm">
                                <label class="font-medium text-gray-700">Allow Long Deferral</label>
                                <p class="text-gray-500">Allows deferral to the latest possible date within the MaxExchangeDays period.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>

                        <!-- Buffer -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Buffer ($/hr)</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" step="0.01" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Dollar-per-hour amount to leave running as on-demand usage.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- MaxExchangeDays -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Max Exchange Days</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Maximum number of days until expiration for cRIs that RightSpend is allowed to modify.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- LazyThreshold -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Lazy Threshold (%)</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" step="0.01" value="0.01" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Skip optimization runs if expected savings gain falls below this threshold.</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Region Parameters -->
            <div x-show="activeTab === 'region'" class="space-y-6">
                <div class="bg-white shadow overflow-hidden sm:rounded-lg">
                    <div class="px-4 py-5 sm:p-6 space-y-6">
                        <!-- Region Selector -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Select Region</label>
                            <select class="mt-1 block w-full pl-3 pr-10 py-2 text-base border-gray-300 focus:outline-none focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 sm:text-sm rounded-md">
                                <option>us-east-1</option>
                                <option>us-east-2</option>
                                <option>us-west-1</option>
                                <option>us-west-2</option>
                                <option>eu-west-1</option>
                            </select>
                        </div>

                        <!-- MaxHourlyCommitment -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Max Hourly Commitment ($/hr)</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" step="0.01" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Maximum $/hr of all cRIs in this region across all accounts.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- MaxTotalCommitment -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Max Total Commitment ($)</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" step="0.01" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Maximum total cRI commitment for this region across all accounts.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- DecreaseRate -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Decrease Rate</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" step="0.01" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Speed of decreasing the cRI commitment when overcommitted.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- IncreaseRate -->
                        <div>
                            <label class="block text-sm font-medium text-gray-700">Increase Rate</label>
                            <div class="mt-1">
                                <input type="number" step="0.01" class="shadow-sm focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-blue-500 block w-full sm:text-sm border-gray-300 rounded-md">
                            </div>
                            <p class="mt-2 text-sm text-gray-500">Speed of increasing the cRI commitment when there's on-demand spend.</p>
                        </div>

                        <!-- ReactToSPDiff -->
                        <div class="relative flex items-start">
                            <div class="flex items-center h-5">
                                <input type="checkbox" class="focus:ring-blue-500 h-4 w-4 text-blue-600 border-gray-300 rounded">
                            </div>
                            <div class="ml-3 text-sm">
                                <label class="font-medium text-gray-700">React to SP Diff</label>
                                <p class="text-gray-500">Enable sharp changes to commitment during the hour following modifications to Savings Plans structure.</p>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

            <!-- Save Button -->
            <div class="mt-6">
                <button type="button" class="inline-flex items-center px-4 py-2 border border-transparent text-sm font-medium rounded-md shadow-sm text-white bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-blue-500">
                    Save Configuration
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </main>
    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: './components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>
    
</body>
</html>

================
File: src/pages/automotive-manufacturer-saves-millions.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="Learn how a Fortune 500 automotive manufacturer achieved over $2.5M in annual AWS savings using RightSpend's automated optimization.">
    <meta property="og:title" content="Case Study: Automotive Manufacturer Saves Millions with RightSpend">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Learn how a Fortune 500 automotive manufacturer achieved over $2.5M in annual AWS savings using RightSpend's automated optimization.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="article">
    <title>Case Study: Automotive Manufacturer Saves Millions with RightSpend</title>
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script defer src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/alpinejs@3.x.x/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
    <script src="/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Article -->
    <article class="py-16">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Article Header -->
                <header class="mb-12">
                    <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Fortune 500 Automotive Manufacturer Saves $2.5M Annually</h1>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-600 mb-6">
                        <time datetime="2025-03-05">March 5, 2025</time>
                        <span class="mx-2">•</span>
                        <span>5 min read</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="prose max-w-none">
                        <p class="text-xl text-gray-600">A leading Fortune 500 automotive manufacturer was looking to optimize their AWS costs without compromising their operational efficiency. With a complex, multi-region infrastructure supporting critical manufacturing operations, they needed a solution that could deliver significant savings while maintaining reliability and performance.</p>
                    </div>
                </header>

                <!-- Article Content -->
                <div class="prose max-w-none">
                    <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8 mb-12">
                        <div class="card text-center">
                            <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">$2.5M+</div>
                            <p class="text-gray-600">Annual AWS Savings</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="card text-center">
                            <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">45%</div>
                            <p class="text-gray-600">Cost Reduction</p>
                        </div>
                        <div class="card text-center">
                            <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">0</div>
                            <p class="text-gray-600">Operational Impact</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>

                    <h2>The Challenge</h2>
                    <p>
                        The manufacturer faced several key challenges in optimizing their AWS costs:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Complex infrastructure spanning multiple AWS regions</li>
                        <li>Critical manufacturing operations requiring high availability</li>
                        <li>Dynamic workload patterns making manual optimization ineffective</li>
                        <li>Risk of overcommitment with traditional savings plans</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>The Solution</h2>
                    <p>
                        RightSpend provided an AI-powered solution that automatically optimized AWS costs while maintaining operational efficiency:
                    </p>
                    
                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>AI-Driven Analysis:</strong> Continuous analysis of usage patterns across all regions to identify optimization opportunities.</li>
                        <li><strong>Automated Optimization:</strong> Real-time adjustments to coverage levels based on actual usage and demand.</li>
                        <li><strong>Risk Management:</strong> Intelligent algorithms prevent overcommitment while maximizing savings.</li>
                        <li><strong>Detailed Reporting:</strong> Comprehensive insights into savings and optimization opportunities.</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>The Results</h2>
                    <p>
                        Within the first year of implementing RightSpend, the manufacturer achieved:
                    </p>
                    
                    <ul>
                        <li>Over $2.5M in annual AWS cost savings</li>
                        <li>45% reduction in overall AWS costs</li>
                        <li>Zero impact on operational performance</li>
                        <li>Improved resource utilization across all regions</li>
                        <li>Complete flexibility to scale up or down as needed</li>
                    </ul>

                    <div class="my-8 p-6 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg">
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold mb-4">Ready to achieve similar results?</p>
                        <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="inline-block px-6 py-3 bg-primary text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-primary-dark transition">Schedule a Demo</a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Article Footer -->
                <footer class="mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-200">
                    <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center">
                        <div class="text-gray-600 mb-4 md:mb-0">
                            Share this article:
                            <div class="inline-flex space-x-4 ml-4">
                                <a href="https://x.com/share?url=https://rightspend.ai/automotive-manufacturer-saves-millions.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600">Twitter</a>
                                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://rightspend.ai/automotive-manufacturer-saves-millions.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600">LinkedIn</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <a href="/blog.html" class="text-primary hover:text-primary-dark">← Back to Blog</a>
                    </div>
                </footer>
            </div>
        </div>
    </article>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>
</body>
</html>

File: src/pages/benefits.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" class="scroll-smooth">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend Benefits - Immediate AWS Cost Optimization</title>
    
    <!-- SEO Meta Tags -->
    <meta name="description" content="Discover the immediate benefits of RightSpend's AI-driven AWS cost optimization. See real-time savings and automated cloud cost management in action.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, cloud cost savings, immediate ROI, automated cost management, cloud infrastructure optimization">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">
    
    <!-- Open Graph Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="RightSpend Benefits - Immediate AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta property="og:description" content="See how RightSpend delivers immediate AWS cost savings through AI-driven optimization and automated management.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/benefits">
    <meta property="og:image" content="/assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">
    
    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="RightSpend Benefits - Immediate AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="See how RightSpend delivers immediate AWS cost savings through AI-driven optimization.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="/assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">
    
    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/assets/images/favicon.svg">
    
    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/aos@next/dist/aos.css" />
    
    <!-- Scripts -->
    <script defer src="https://unpkg.com/alpinejs@3.x.x/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@next/dist/aos.js"></script>
    <script src="/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="relative bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary overflow-hidden py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto text-center text-white">

                    Benefits of RightSpend
                </h1>
                <p class="text-xl md:text-2xl mb-12" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
                    Maximize your AWS savings with intelligent cost optimization and automated management
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
        <!-- Decorative elements -->
        <div class="absolute inset-0 overflow-hidden pointer-events-none">
            <div class="absolute top-0 right-0 w-1/2 h-1/2 bg-white opacity-5 rounded-full transform translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2"></div>
            <div class="absolute bottom-0 left-0 w-1/3 h-1/3 bg-white opacity-5 rounded-full transform -translate-x-1/2 translate-y-1/2"></div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Main Content -->
    <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 py-12">
        <!-- Cost Savings Graph Section -->
        <div class="bg-white rounded-lg shadow-xl p-6 mb-12">
            <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-6">Instant Cost Reduction</h2>
            <div class="mb-8">
                <canvas id="costGraph" class="w-full" height="400"></canvas>
            </div>
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 mt-8">
                <div class="bg-blue-50 p-6 rounded-lg">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-blue-800 mb-3">Reserved Instances Optimization</h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-700">RightSpend automatically converts eligible on-demand instances to reserved instances, providing immediate cost savings of up to 30-40%.</p>
                </div>
                <div class="bg-yellow-50 p-6 rounded-lg">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold text-yellow-800 mb-3">On-Demand Cost Reduction</h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-700">Watch your on-demand costs drop significantly as RightSpend intelligently optimizes your resource allocation and usage patterns.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

        
        <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
            <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                <div class="text-3xl text-blue-600 mb-4">⚡</div>
                <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Immediate Impact</h3>
                <p class="text-gray-600">See cost reductions from day one of implementation, with no disruption to your operations.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                <div class="text-3xl text-blue-600 mb-4">📊</div>
                <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Automated Optimization</h3>
                <p class="text-gray-600">Our AI continuously monitors and optimizes your cloud resource allocation for maximum efficiency.</p>
            </div>
            <div class="bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg">
                <div class="text-3xl text-blue-600 mb-4">💰</div>
                <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-3">Sustained Savings</h3>
                <p class="text-gray-600">Maintain optimal cloud costs through continuous monitoring and adjustment of resources.</p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <script>
        // Graph initialization
        const ctx = document.getElementById('costGraph').getContext('2d');
        new Chart(ctx, {
            type: 'bar',
            data: {
                labels: ['Before RightSpend', 'After RightSpend'],
                datasets: [
                    {
                        label: 'Reserved Instances',
                        data: [0, 125],
                        backgroundColor: 'rgb(59, 130, 246)',
                    },
                    {
                        label: 'On-Demand Costs',
                        data: [220, 25],
                        backgroundColor: 'rgb(251, 191, 36)',
                    }
                ]
            },
            options: {
                plugins: {
                    title: {
                        display: true,
                        text: 'Daily Cloud Costs (USD)',
                        font: {
                            size: 16
                        }
                    }
                },
                responsive: true,
                scales: {
                    x: {
                        stacked: true,
                    },
                    y: {
                        stacked: true,
                        beginAtZero: true,
                        title: {
                            display: true,
                            text: 'Cost in USD'
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        });
    </script>
    <!-- Apollo Tracking Script -->
    <!--
    <script>
        function initApollo(){var n=Math.random().toString(36).substring(7),o=document.createElement("script");
        o.src="https://assets.apollo.io/micro/website-tracker/tracker.iife.js?nocache="+n,o.async=!0,o.defer=!0,
        o.onload=function(){window.trackingFunctions.onLoad({appId:"6602e615b2af9b0439deed0c"})},
        document.head.appendChild(o)}initApollo();
    </script>
    -->
</body>
</html>

================
File: src/pages/blog/template.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>The Future of Cloud Cost Optimization - RightSpend Blog</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Explore how AI and automation are revolutionizing the way organizations approach AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, cloud savings, AI automation, future of cloud computing">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="The Future of Cloud Cost Optimization - RightSpend Blog">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Explore how AI and automation are revolutionizing the way organizations approach AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="article">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/blog/template">
    <meta property="og:image" content="../../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="The Future of Cloud Cost Optimization - RightSpend Blog">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Explore how AI and automation are revolutionizing the way organizations approach AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="../../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="../../assets/images/favicon.svg">

    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../../components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Blog Post -->
    <article class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Post Header -->
                <header class="mb-16">
                    <h1 class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-8">The Future of Cloud Cost Optimization</h1>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-500 mb-8">
                        <span class="mr-4">February 25, 2025</span>
                        <span class="mr-4">•</span>
                        <span>6 min read</span>
                    </div>
                    <img src="../../assets/images/cloud-savings-icon.svg" alt="Cloud Cost Optimization" class="w-full rounded-lg shadow-lg mb-8">
                </header>

                <!-- Post Content -->
                <div class="prose prose-lg max-w-none">
                    <p>
                        The landscape of cloud cost optimization is rapidly evolving, driven by advancements in artificial intelligence and automation. As organizations continue to migrate more workloads to the cloud, the need for intelligent, automated cost optimization solutions becomes increasingly critical.
                    </p>

                    <h2>The Rise of AI in Cloud Cost Management</h2>
                    <p>
                        Traditional approaches to cloud cost optimization often rely on manual analysis and static rules. However, the complexity of modern cloud environments demands more sophisticated solutions. AI-powered tools like RightSpend are leading the way in this transformation.
                    </p>

                    <h3>Key Trends Shaping the Future</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Real-time optimization through AI analysis</li>
                        <li>Automated coverage adjustments based on usage patterns</li>
                        <li>Predictive analytics for cost forecasting</li>
                        <li>Dynamic resource allocation</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>The Role of Machine Learning</h2>
                    <p>
                        Machine learning algorithms are becoming increasingly sophisticated in their ability to analyze cloud usage patterns and make intelligent optimization decisions. These systems can:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Identify cost-saving opportunities in real-time</li>
                        <li>Predict future resource needs</li>
                        <li>Optimize coverage levels automatically</li>
                        <li>Prevent overcommitment while maximizing savings</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>Breaking Free from Traditional Constraints</h2>
                    <p>
                        One of the most significant developments in cloud cost optimization is the move away from long-term commitments and rigid savings plans. Modern solutions like RightSpend offer:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Complete flexibility to scale up or down</li>
                        <li>No lock-in periods</li>
                        <li>Real-time adjustments based on actual usage</li>
                        <li>Risk-free optimization</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>The Impact on Organizations</h2>
                    <p>
                        Organizations implementing these next-generation cost optimization solutions are seeing significant benefits:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Up to 55% reduction in AWS costs</li>
                        <li>Eliminated decision fatigue</li>
                        <li>Improved resource utilization</li>
                        <li>Better cost predictability</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>Looking Ahead</h2>
                    <p>
                        As AI and automation technologies continue to evolve, we can expect even more sophisticated approaches to cloud cost optimization. The future promises even greater savings potential while further reducing the complexity of cloud cost management.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Author Bio -->
                <div class="mt-16 p-8 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-sm">
                    <div class="flex items-center">
                        <div class="ml-4">
                            <h3 class="font-semibold">RightSpend Team</h3>
                            <p class="text-gray-600">Cloud Cost Optimization Experts</p>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </article>

    <!-- Related Posts Section -->
    <section class="py-24 bg-gray-100">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h2 class="text-3xl font-bold mb-16">Related Posts</h2>
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8 max-w-6xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Related Post 1 -->
                <div class="card">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">
                        <a href="/automotive-manufacturer-saves-millions.html" class="hover:text-primary">
                            How a Fortune 500 Manufacturer Saved $2.5M on AWS Costs
                        </a>
                    </h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                        Learn how a leading automotive manufacturer achieved significant AWS savings while maintaining operational efficiency.
                    </p>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-500">
                        <span class="mr-4">March 5, 2025</span>
                        <span>5 min read</span>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Related Post 2 -->
                <div class="card">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">
                        <a href="/cut-aws-costs-with-cloudfix-rightspend.html" class="hover:text-primary">
                            Cut AWS Costs with CloudFix RightSpend
                        </a>
                    </h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                        Discover how RightSpend's AI-powered solution can help you achieve up to 55% savings on your AWS costs.
                    </p>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-500">
                        <span class="mr-4">March 1, 2025</span>
                        <span>4 min read</span>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Related Post 3 -->
                <div class="card">
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">
                        <a href="/no-break-even-worries.html" class="hover:text-primary">
                            No Break-Even Worries with RightSpend
                        </a>
                    </h3>
                    <p class="text-gray-600 mb-6">
                        Learn why traditional AWS savings plans can lead to break-even anxiety and how RightSpend eliminates this concern.
                    </p>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-500">
                        <span class="mr-4">February 28, 2025</span>
                        <span>3 min read</span>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- CTA Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6 text-center">
            <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold mb-8">Ready to Optimize Your AWS Costs?</h2>
                <p class="text-xl text-gray-600 mb-12">Schedule a call to learn how RightSpend can help you achieve maximum savings with complete flexibility</p>
                <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-center gap-4">
                    <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" class="btn-primary text-lg">Find Out More</a>
                    <a href="/engine" class="btn-outline text-lg">Learn How It Works</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../../components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Initialize AOS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.js"></script>
    <link href="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            AOS.init({
                duration: 800,
                once: true
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: src/pages/cut-aws-costs-with-cloudfix-rightspend.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="Discover how RightSpend's AI-powered solution can help you achieve up to 55% savings on your AWS costs without long-term commitments.">
    <meta property="og:title" content="Cut AWS Costs with CloudFix RightSpend - No Long-Term Commitment">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Discover how RightSpend's AI-powered solution can help you achieve up to 55% savings on your AWS costs without long-term commitments.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="article">
    <title>Cut AWS Costs with CloudFix RightSpend - No Long-Term Commitment</title>
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script defer src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/alpinejs@3.x.x/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
    <script src="/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Article -->
    <article class="py-16">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Article Header -->
                <header class="mb-12">
                    <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">Cut AWS Costs with CloudFix RightSpend</h1>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-600 mb-6">
                        <time datetime="2025-03-01">March 1, 2025</time>
                        <span class="mx-2">•</span>
                        <span>4 min read</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="prose max-w-none">
                        <p class="text-xl text-gray-600">In today's cloud-first world, managing AWS costs effectively has become a critical challenge for organizations of all sizes. Traditional approaches to cost optimization often come with significant drawbacks, including long-term commitments and complex management requirements. RightSpend offers a revolutionary solution that delivers maximum savings without the traditional constraints.</p>
                    </div>
                </header>

                <!-- Article Content -->
                <div class="prose max-w-none">
                    <h2>The Challenge of AWS Cost Optimization</h2>
                    <p>
                        Organizations face several key challenges when trying to optimize their AWS costs:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Long-term commitments required by traditional savings plans</li>
                        <li>Complex decision-making around coverage levels</li>
                        <li>Risk of overcommitment and wasted resources</li>
                        <li>Manual optimization efforts that can't keep pace with dynamic workloads</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>The RightSpend Solution</h2>
                    <p>
                        RightSpend addresses these challenges through an innovative, AI-powered approach that delivers:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Up to 55% savings on AWS costs</li>
                        <li>No long-term commitments or lock-in periods</li>
                        <li>Automated optimization based on actual usage</li>
                        <li>Real-time adjustments to maximize savings</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>Key Features</h2>
                    <h3>1. AI-Powered Analysis</h3>
                    <p>
                        RightSpend's advanced AI algorithms continuously analyze your AWS usage patterns to identify optimization opportunities and make intelligent decisions about resource allocation.
                    </p>

                    <h3>2. Automated Optimization</h3>
                    <p>
                        Once opportunities are identified, RightSpend automatically implements optimizations to ensure maximum savings without any manual intervention required.
                    </p>

                    <h3>3. Complete Flexibility</h3>
                    <p>
                        Unlike traditional savings plans, RightSpend offers complete flexibility to scale up or down as needed, with no long-term commitments or lock-in periods.
                    </p>

                    <h3>4. Comprehensive Coverage</h3>
                    <p>
                        RightSpend optimizes costs across multiple AWS services and regions, ensuring comprehensive coverage of your cloud infrastructure.
                    </p>

                    <h2>Implementation Process</h2>
                    <p>
                        Getting started with RightSpend is straightforward:
                    </p>
                    <ol>
                        <li>Quick integration with your AWS account</li>
                        <li>Initial analysis of your usage patterns</li>
                        <li>Automated implementation of optimization strategies</li>
                        <li>Continuous monitoring and adjustment</li>
                    </ol>

                    <h2>Real Results</h2>
                    <p>
                        Organizations using RightSpend have achieved significant results:
                    </p>
                    <ul>
                        <li>Fortune 500 manufacturer: $2.5M annual savings</li>
                        <li>Average customer savings: 45% on AWS costs</li>
                        <li>Zero operational impact during implementation</li>
                        <li>Immediate cost reduction from day one</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>Getting Started</h2>
                    <p>
                        Ready to start optimizing your AWS costs? Schedule a call with our team to learn how RightSpend can help your organization achieve significant savings without the traditional constraints of long-term commitments.
                    </p>

                    <div class="my-8 p-6 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg">
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold mb-4">Ready to see how much RightSpend can save you?</p>
                        <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="inline-block px-6 py-3 bg-primary text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-primary-dark transition">Schedule a Demo</a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Article Footer -->
                <footer class="mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-200">
                    <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center">
                        <div class="text-gray-600 mb-4 md:mb-0">
                            Share this article:
                            <div class="inline-flex space-x-4 ml-4">
                                <a href="https://x.com/share?url=https://rightspend.ai/cut-aws-costs-with-cloudfix-rightspend.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600">Twitter</a>
                                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://rightspend.ai/cut-aws-costs-with-cloudfix-rightspend.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600">LinkedIn</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <a href="/blog.html" class="text-primary hover:text-primary-dark">← Back to Blog</a>
                    </div>
                </footer>
            </div>
        </div>
    </article>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend Engine - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Learn about the RightSpend Engine, our AI-powered solution for continuous AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, RightSpend, AI engine, cloud savings, automation">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="RightSpend Engine - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Learn about the RightSpend Engine, our AI-powered solution for continuous AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/engine">
    <meta property="og:image" content="../assets/images/rightspend-diagram.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="RightSpend Engine - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Learn about the RightSpend Engine, our AI-powered solution for continuous AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="../assets/images/rightspend-diagram.png">

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend FAQ - Common Questions About AWS Cost Optimization</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Find answers to frequently asked questions about RightSpend and AWS cost optimization. Learn how to maximize your cloud savings today.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, cloud savings, RightSpend, FAQ, frequently asked questions">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="RightSpend FAQ - Common Questions About AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Find answers to frequently asked questions about RightSpend and AWS cost optimization. Learn how to maximize your cloud savings today.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/faq">
    <meta property="og:image" content="../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="RightSpend FAQ - Common Questions About AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Find answers to frequently asked questions about RightSpend and AWS cost optimization. Learn how to maximize your cloud savings today.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Favicon -->
