    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- FAQ Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold text-center text-primary mb-12">Frequently Asked Questions</h1>

            <div class="max-w-4xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Question 1 -->
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-2">What is RightSpend?</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                        RightSpend is an AI-powered solution that helps businesses maximize their AWS savings with complete flexibility and automated coverage optimization.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Question 2 -->
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-2">How does RightSpend work?</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                        RightSpend seamlessly integrates with your AWS account, analyzes your usage patterns, and automatically adjusts your coverage to optimize costs.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Question 3 -->
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-2">What are the benefits of using RightSpend?</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                        With RightSpend, you can achieve up to 55% savings on your AWS costs, eliminate decision fatigue, reduce risk, and maximize coverage.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Question 4 -->
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-2">Is there a long-term commitment?</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                        No, RightSpend offers unmatched flexibility with no long-term commitments. You can scale up or down anytime and there is zero lock-in period.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Question 5 -->
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-2">How secure is RightSpend?</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                        RightSpend uses a secure, read-only integration to ensure your infrastructure stays safe.
                    </p>
                </div>

                <!-- Question 6 -->
                <div class="mb-8">
                    <h2 class="text-2xl font-semibold mb-2">What AWS services does RightSpend support?</h2>
                    <p class="text-gray-600">
                        RightSpend offers comprehensive service support and cross-region optimization to maximize your savings potential.
                    </p>
                </div>
            </div>

            <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-center gap-4 mt-12">
                <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="btn-primary text-lg">Find Out More</a>
                <a href="/engine" class="btn-outline text-lg">Learn How It Works</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Initialize AOS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.js"></script>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend Features - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Explore RightSpend's powerful features for AWS cost optimization. AI-driven analysis, automated adjustments, and continuous optimization.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, RightSpend features, cloud savings, automation, AI optimization">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="RightSpend Features - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Explore RightSpend's powerful features for AWS cost optimization. AI-driven analysis, automated adjustments, and continuous optimization.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/features">
    <meta property="og:image" content="../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="RightSpend Features - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Explore RightSpend's powerful features for AWS cost optimization. AI-driven analysis, automated adjustments, and continuous optimization.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="../assets/images/favicon.svg">

    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary text-white py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6 text-center">
            <h1 class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-8">RightSpend Features</h1>
            <p class="text-xl md:text-2xl mb-12">Powerful Tools for AWS Cost Optimization</p>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Core Features Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-16">Core Features</h2>
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-8">
                <!-- AI Analysis -->
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">🧠</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">AI-Powered Analysis</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Usage pattern analysis
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Intelligent forecasting
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Gap identification
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <!-- Automation -->
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">⚙️</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Full Automation</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Real-time adjustments
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Automated coverage optimization
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Risk management
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <!-- Coverage -->
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">🎯</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Comprehensive Coverage</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Multi-service support
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Cross-region optimization
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Maximum resource utilization
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Additional Features Section -->
    <section class="py-24 bg-gray-100">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-16">Additional Features</h2>
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-8 max-w-4xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Integration -->
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">🔌</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Easy Integration</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Quick AWS integration
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Read-only access
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Secure setup
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                <!-- Reporting -->
                <div class="card">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">📊</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Detailed Reporting</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Savings reports
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Usage analytics
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Optimization insights
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- CTA Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6 text-center">
            <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold mb-8">Ready to Get Started?</h2>
                <p class="text-xl text-gray-600 mb-12">Schedule a call to learn how RightSpend can help you achieve maximum savings with complete flexibility</p>
                <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row justify-center gap-4">
                    <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" class="btn-primary text-lg">Find Out More</a>
                    <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" class="btn-outline text-lg">Contact Sales</a>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Initialize AOS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.js"></script>
    <link href="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            AOS.init({
                duration: 800,
                once: true
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

File: src/pages/how-it-works.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>How RightSpend Works - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Learn how RightSpend's AI-powered solution automatically optimizes your AWS costs with no long-term commitments.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, RightSpend, how it works, cloud savings, AI automation">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="How RightSpend Works - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Learn how RightSpend's AI-powered solution automatically optimizes your AWS costs with no long-term commitments.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/how-it-works">
    <meta property="og:image" content="../assets/images/rightspend-diagram.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="How RightSpend Works - AI-Powered AWS Cost Optimization">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Learn how RightSpend's AI-powered solution automatically optimizes your AWS costs with no long-term commitments.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="../assets/images/rightspend-diagram.png">

    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="../assets/images/favicon.svg">

    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>

    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

File: src/pages/index.html

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en" class="scroll-smooth">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend - Maximize AWS Savings Without Lock-in</title>
    
    <!-- SEO Meta Tags -->
    <meta name="description" content="Achieve up to 55% AWS savings with complete flexibility and automated coverage optimization. No lock-in, real-time adjustments, and AI-driven decision making.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, cloud savings, RightSpend, automated optimization, cloud coverage">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="RightSpend - Maximize AWS Savings Without Lock-in">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Achieve up to 55% AWS savings with complete flexibility and automated coverage optimization.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai">
    <meta property="og:image" content="/assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="RightSpend - Maximize AWS Savings Without Lock-in">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Achieve up to 55% AWS savings with complete flexibility and automated coverage optimization.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="/assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">
    
    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="/assets/images/favicon.svg">
    
    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    
    <!-- Scripts -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/alpinejs@3.12.3/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
    <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chart.js"></script>
    <script defer src="/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '/components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="py-24 bg-white">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row items-center justify-between">
                <div class="md:w-1/2 mb-12 md:mb-0">
                    <h1 class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-6" data-aos="fade-up">
                        Maximize AWS Savings Without Lock-in
                    </h1>
                    <p class="text-xl text-gray-600 mb-8" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
                        Achieve up to 55% AWS savings with complete flexibility and automated coverage optimization. No lock-in, real-time adjustments, and AI-driven decision making.
                    </p>
                    <div class="flex flex-col sm:flex-row gap-4" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="200">
                        <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" class="btn-primary text-lg">Get Started</a>

                    <img src="/assets/images/hero-illustration.svg" alt="RightSpend AWS Cost Optimization" class="w-full">
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Key Benefits Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-16" data-aos="fade-up">
                Key Benefits of RightSpend
            </h2>
            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-12">
                <!-- Flexibility -->
                <div class="card" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">🔄</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Unmatched Flexibility</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            No long-term commitments
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>

                        <li class="flex items-start">

                    </ul>

                        <li class="flex items-start">

                            Comprehensive service support
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Cross-region optimization
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Intelligent gap analysis
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Maximum resource utilization
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                
                <div class="card" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="300">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">💰</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Higher Effective Savings</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Up to 55% off on-demand pricing
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Optimized coverage strategies
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Reduced waste and overcommitment
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Continuous cost optimization
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>

                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">🤖</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Full Automation</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            AI-driven decision making
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Real-time adjustments
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Automated risk management
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            Continuous optimization
                        </li>
                    </ul>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- How It Works Section -->
    <section class="py-24 bg-gray-100">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-16" data-aos="fade-up">
                How RightSpend Works
            </h2>

            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-4 gap-8 max-w-5xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Connect -->
                <div class="relative" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
                    <div class="card h-full">
                        <div class="text-4xl mb-4">1️⃣</div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Connect</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2 text-gray-600">
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Quick AWS integration
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Read-only access
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Secure setup
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="hidden md:block absolute top-1/2 left-full w-full h-1 bg-primary transform -translate-y-1/2 -z-10"></div>
                </div>

                <!-- Analyze -->
                <div class="relative" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="200">
                    <div class="card h-full">
                        <div class="text-4xl mb-4">2️⃣</div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Analyze</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2 text-gray-600">
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                AI-powered assessment
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Usage pattern analysis
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Coverage gap identification
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="hidden md:block absolute top-1/2 left-full w-full h-1 bg-primary transform -translate-y-1/2 -z-10"></div>
                </div>

                <!-- Optimize -->
                <div class="relative" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="300">
                    <div class="card h-full">
                        <div class="text-4xl mb-4">3️⃣</div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Optimize</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2 text-gray-600">
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Automated adjustments
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Real-time optimization
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Risk management
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                    <div class="hidden md:block absolute top-1/2 left-full w-full h-1 bg-primary transform -translate-y-1/2 -z-10"></div>
                </div>

                <!-- Save -->
                <div data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="400">
                    <div class="card h-full">
                        <div class="text-4xl mb-4">4️⃣</div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Save</h3>
                        <ul class="space-y-2 text-gray-600">
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Immediate cost reduction
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Ongoing optimization
                            </li>
                            <li class="flex items-start">
                                <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                                Regular savings reports
                            </li>
                        </ul>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>

    <!-- Why RightSpend Section -->
    <section class="py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <h2 class="text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold text-center mb-16" data-aos="fade-up">
                Stop Wrestling with Complex AWS Cost Decisions
            </h2>

            <div class="grid md:grid-cols-3 gap-12 max-w-6xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Eliminate Decision Fatigue -->
                <div class="card" data-aos="fade-up" data-aos-delay="100">
                    <div class="text-primary text-4xl mb-4">🎯</div>
                    <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">Eliminate Decision Fatigue</h3>
                    <ul class="space-y-3 text-gray-600">
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>
                            No more guessing coverage levels
                        </li>
                        <li class="flex items-start">
                            <span class="text-primary mr-2">✓</span>

                        <li class="flex items-start">

                            Intelligent forecasting

                    </ul>
                </div>

                <!-- Reduce Risk -->

================
File: src/pages/no-break-even-worries.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <meta name="description" content="Learn how RightSpend eliminates break-even point concerns with automated EC2 CRI purchases for AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta property="og:title" content="No Break-Even Worries with Automated EC2 CRI Purchases - RightSpend">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Learn how RightSpend eliminates break-even point concerns with automated EC2 CRI purchases for AWS cost optimization.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="article">
    <title>No Break-Even Worries with Automated EC2 CRI Purchases - RightSpend</title>
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script defer src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/alpinejs@3.x.x/dist/cdn.min.js"></script>
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Article -->
    <article class="py-16">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6">
            <div class="max-w-3xl mx-auto">
                <!-- Article Header -->
                <header class="mb-12">
                    <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold mb-4">RightSpend: No Break-Even Worries with Automated EC2 CRI Purchases</h1>
                    <div class="flex items-center text-gray-600 mb-6">
                        <time datetime="2025-02-20">February 20, 2025</time>
                        <span class="mx-2">•</span>
                        <span>4 min read</span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="prose max-w-none">
                        <p class="text-xl text-gray-600">One of the common concerns when adopting Reserved Instances (RIs) for your AWS EC2 spend is the dreaded "break-even point." You know, that point in time where the savings from your RI finally outweigh the upfront cost? It's a valid concern – you want to be sure you're actually saving money!</p>
                    </div>
                </header>

                <!-- Article Content -->
                <div class="prose max-w-none">
                    <p>Some older approaches to RI management require careful calculation of break-even points. You have to factor in the upfront cost, the hourly rate, and your expected utilization to determine when you'll start seeing a return on your investment. This can be time-consuming and requires constant monitoring to ensure your projections are accurate.</p>

                    <p class="text-2xl font-bold text-primary">RightSpend changes the game. You can forget about break-even points altogether!</p>

                    <h2>How RightSpend Eliminates Break-Even Anxiety</h2>

                    <p>RightSpend automates the entire EC2 Convertible Reserved Instance (CRI) purchase process, focusing on <em>dynamic optimization</em>. Here's how we make break-even worries a thing of the past:</p>

                    <ul>
                        <li><strong>Continuous Analysis:</strong> RightSpend constantly analyzes your EC2 usage patterns. We don't just look at historical data; we use advanced algorithms to predict future needs.</li>
                        <li><strong>Automated Purchasing:</strong> Based on this continuous analysis, RightSpend automatically purchases CRIs <em>only</em> when they are guaranteed to provide immediate savings.</li>
                        <li><strong>Optimal Instance Selection:</strong> RightSpend identifies the <em>best</em> CRI options for your specific workload, ensuring maximum savings from day one. No guesswork, no manual calculations.</li>
                        <li><strong>Automated Swapping:</strong> RightSpend automatically swaps CRIs as your needs evolve, ensuring you're always using the most cost-effective options. This eliminates the risk of being locked into an RI that no longer matches your usage, something that would destroy any break-even calculation.</li>
                        <li><strong>Guaranteed Savings:</strong> By automating the entire process and focusing on continuous optimization, RightSpend <em>guarantees</em> savings from the moment you switch it on.</li>
                    </ul>

                    <h2>The RightSpend Advantage: Immediate Value</h2>

                    <p>With RightSpend, you're not waiting to "break even." You're saving money from day one. Our system ensures that every CRI purchase is optimized for your current and projected needs, eliminating the risk of underutilization and maximizing your ROI.</p>

                    <h2>Stop Calculating, Start Saving</h2>

                    <p>Stop wasting time calculating break-even points and start enjoying the immediate benefits of RightSpend. Our automated EC2 CRI purchasing solution takes the guesswork out of cloud cost optimization, delivering guaranteed savings without the hassle.</p>

                    <div class="my-8 p-6 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg">
                        <p class="text-xl font-bold mb-4">Ready to see how much RightSpend can save you?</p>
                        <a href="https://app.apollo.io/#/meet/tim_galloway_f2d" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="inline-block px-6 py-3 bg-primary text-white rounded-lg hover:bg-primary-dark transition">Schedule a Demo</a>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <!-- Article Footer -->
                <footer class="mt-12 pt-8 border-t border-gray-200">
                    <div class="flex flex-col md:flex-row justify-between items-center">
                        <div class="text-gray-600 mb-4 md:mb-0">
                            Share this article:
                            <div class="inline-flex space-x-4 ml-4">
                                <a href="https://x.com/share?url=https://rightspend.ai/no-break-even-worries.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600">Twitter</a>
                                <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/sharing/share-offsite/?url=https://rightspend.ai/no-break-even-worries.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" class="text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600">LinkedIn</a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <a href="/blog.html" class="text-primary hover:text-primary-dark">← Back to Blog</a>
                    </div>
                </footer>
            </div>
        </div>
    </article>

    <!-- Footer -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/footer.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>
</body>
</html>

                        </p>
                    </div>

                    <div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">How long is the commitment?</h3>

                        </p>
                    </div>

                    <div>
                        <h3 class="text-xl font-semibold mb-4">How is billing handled?</h3>

                        </p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

================
File: src/pages/use-cases.html
================
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>RightSpend Use Cases - AWS Cost Optimization Success Stories</title>
    <meta name="description" content="Explore real-world examples of how organizations use RightSpend to optimize their AWS costs and achieve significant savings.">
    <meta name="keywords" content="AWS cost optimization, RightSpend use cases, cloud savings, success stories, case studies">
    <meta name="author" content="CloudFix">

    <!-- Open Graph / Social Media Meta Tags -->
    <meta property="og:title" content="RightSpend Use Cases - AWS Cost Optimization Success Stories">
    <meta property="og:description" content="Explore real-world examples of how organizations use RightSpend to optimize their AWS costs and achieve significant savings.">
    <meta property="og:type" content="website">
    <meta property="og:url" content="https://rightspend.ai/use-cases">
    <meta property="og:image" content="../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Twitter Card Tags -->
    <meta name="twitter:card" content="summary_large_image">
    <meta name="twitter:title" content="RightSpend Use Cases - AWS Cost Optimization Success Stories">
    <meta name="twitter:description" content="Explore real-world examples of how organizations use RightSpend to optimize their AWS costs and achieve significant savings.">
    <meta name="twitter:image" content="../assets/images/RightSpend-cool.png">

    <!-- Favicon -->
    <link rel="icon" type="image/svg+xml" href="../assets/images/favicon.svg">

    <!-- Styles -->
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <link href="/css/styles.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script src="/src/scripts/main.js"></script>
</head>
<body class="font-sans bg-gray-50">
    <!-- Header -->
    <div x-data="{ includeFile: '../components/header.html' }" x-init="fetch(includeFile).then(response => response.text()).then(html => { $el.innerHTML = html })"></div>

    <!-- Hero Section -->
    <section class="bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary text-white py-24">
        <div class="container mx-auto px-6 text-center">
            <h1 class="text-4xl md:text-5xl font-bold mb-8">Use Cases</h1>
            <p class="text-xl md:text-2xl mb-12">Real-World AWS Cost Optimization Success Stories</p>
        </div>
    </section>

                </div>
            </div>
        </div>

    <!-- Initialize AOS -->
    <script src="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.js"></script>
    <link href="https://unpkg.com/aos@2.3.1/dist/aos.css" rel="stylesheet">
    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
            AOS.init({
                duration: 800,
                once: true
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
</html>

================
File: src/scripts/main.js
================
// Initialize Google Analytics
function initGoogleAnalytics() {
    console.log('Initializing Google Analytics...');
    
    // Load GA script
    var gaScript = document.createElement('script');
    gaScript.async = true;
    gaScript.src = 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=G-9Z5L1G47QC';
    document.head.appendChild(gaScript);
    
    // Initialize dataLayer and gtag
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
    gtag('js', new Date());
    gtag('config', 'G-9Z5L1G47QC');
    
    console.log('Google Analytics initialized');
}

// Track Events Helper
function trackEvent(category, action, label = null, value = null) {
    if (window.gtag) {
        gtag('event', action, {
            'event_category': category,
            'event_label': label,
            'value': value
        });
        console.log(`Tracked event: ${category} - ${action} - ${label}`);
    }
}

// Setup Event Tracking
function setupEventTracking() {
    console.log('Setting up event tracking...');
    
    // Track CTA Clicks
    document.querySelectorAll('a.btn-primary').forEach(button => {
        button.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            const buttonText = this.textContent.trim();
            const destination = this.href;
            trackEvent('CTA', 'click', buttonText);
            
            // Track specific conversions
            if (buttonText.includes('Find Out More')) {
                trackEvent('Conversion', 'demo_request', destination);
            } else if (buttonText.includes('Calculate')) {
                trackEvent('Conversion', 'calculator_use', destination);
            }
        });
    });

    // Track Navigation
    document.querySelectorAll('nav a').forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            trackEvent('Navigation', 'click', this.textContent.trim());
        });
    });

    // Track Scroll Depth
    let scrollDepths = [25, 50, 75, 100];
    let scrolledDepths = new Set();
    
    window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
        const scrollPercent = (window.scrollY + window.innerHeight) / document.documentElement.scrollHeight * 100;
        
        scrollDepths.forEach(depth => {
            if (scrollPercent >= depth && !scrolledDepths.has(depth)) {
                scrolledDepths.add(depth);
                trackEvent('Scroll', 'depth_reached', `${depth}%`);
            }
        });
    });

    // Track Time on Page
    let timeIntervals = [30, 60, 180, 300]; // seconds
    timeIntervals.forEach(interval => {
        setTimeout(() => {
            trackEvent('Engagement', 'time_on_page', `${interval}s`);
        }, interval * 1000);
    });

    // Track External Links
    document.querySelectorAll('a[target="_blank"]').forEach(link => {
        link.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
            trackEvent('External Link', 'click', this.href);
        });
    });

    // Track Blog Engagement (if on blog page)
    if (window.location.pathname.includes('/blog')) {
        // Track article clicks
        document.querySelectorAll('article').forEach(article => {
            article.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                const title = this.querySelector('h2, h3')?.textContent || 'Untitled';
                trackEvent('Blog', 'article_click', title);
            });
        });
    }

    console.log('Event tracking setup complete');
}

// Check if tracking is blocked
function isTrackingBlocked() {
    return window.doNotTrack === "1" || 
           navigator.doNotTrack === "1" || 
           navigator.doNotTrack === "yes";
}

// Initialize Apollo Tracking
function initApollo() {
    if (isTrackingBlocked()) {
        console.log('Tracking appears to be blocked by browser settings or extensions');
        return;
    }
    
    console.log('Initializing Apollo tracking...');
    var n = Math.random().toString(36).substring(7);
    var o = document.createElement("script");
    o.src = "https://assets.apollo.io/micro/website-tracker/tracker.iife.js?nocache=" + n;
    o.async = true;
    o.defer = true;
    o.onload = function() {
        console.log('Apollo script loaded successfully');
        window.trackingFunctions.onLoad({appId: "6602e615b2af9b0439deed0c"});
    };
    o.onerror = function(error) {
        console.log('Apollo script loading failed. This is normal if you have an ad blocker or privacy extension enabled.');
    };
    document.head.appendChild(o);
}

// Initialize RevenueBase (rb2b) Tracking
function initReb2b() {
    if (isTrackingBlocked()) {
        console.log('Tracking appears to be blocked by browser settings or extensions');
        return;
    }
    
    console.log('Initializing RevenueBase tracking...');
    var reb2b = window.reb2b = window.reb2b || [];
    if (reb2b.invoked) {
        console.log('RevenueBase already initialized');
        return;
    }
    reb2b.invoked = true;
    reb2b.methods = ["identify", "collect"];
    reb2b.factory = function(method) {
        return function() {
            var args = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments);
            args.unshift(method);
            reb2b.push(args);
            return reb2b;
        };
    };
    for (var i = 0; i < reb2b.methods.length; i++) {
        var key = reb2b.methods[i];
        reb2b[key] = reb2b.factory(key);
    }
    reb2b.load = function(key) {
        console.log('Loading RevenueBase script...');
        var script = document.createElement("script");
        script.type = "text/javascript";
        script.async = true;
        script.src = "https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/b2bjsstore/b/" + key + "/LNKLDHP2G1OJ.js.gz";
        script.onload = function() {
            console.log('RevenueBase script loaded successfully');
        };
        script.onerror = function() {
            console.log('RevenueBase script loading failed. This is normal if you have an ad blocker or privacy extension enabled.');
        };
        var first = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
        first.parentNode.insertBefore(script, first);
    };
    reb2b.SNIPPET_VERSION = "1.0.1";
    reb2b.load("LNKLDHP2G1OJ");
}

// Initialize tracking scripts
let initialized = false;

async function initializeTracking() {
    if (initialized) {
        console.log('Tracking already initialized');
        return;
    }
    
    console.log('DOM loaded, initializing tracking scripts...');
    
    initialized = true;
    
    // Initialize all tracking scripts
    try {
        await Promise.all([
            new Promise(resolve => {
                initGoogleAnalytics();
                resolve();
            }),
            new Promise(resolve => {
                initApollo();
                resolve();
            }),
            new Promise(resolve => {
                initReb2b();
                resolve();
            })
        ]);
        
        // Setup event tracking after all scripts are loaded
        setupEventTracking();
        console.log('Main.js initialization complete');
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error initializing tracking:', error);
    }
}

// Component Loading
async function loadComponent(id, path) {
    try {
        const response = await fetch(path);
        if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`Failed to load ${path}`);
        const html = await response.text();
        const element = document.getElementById(id);
        if (element) {
            element.innerHTML = html;
            console.log(`Component ${id} loaded successfully`);
        } else {
            console.error(`Element with id '${id}' not found`);
        }
    } catch (error) {
        console.error(`Error loading component ${id}:`, error);
    }
}

// Initialize components and tracking
async function initializeApp() {
    console.log('Initializing application...');
    
    // First load all components
    await Promise.all([
        loadComponent('header', '/components/header.html'),
        loadComponent('footer', '/components/footer.html')
    ]);
    
    // Then initialize Alpine.js
    console.log('Components loaded, initializing Alpine.js...');
    
    // Now initialize tracking
    document.addEventListener('alpine:init', initializeTracking);
}

// Start initialization when DOM is ready
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeApp);

================
File: src/styles/input.css
================
@tailwind base;
@tailwind components;
@tailwind utilities;

@layer base {
  html {
    scroll-behavior: smooth;
  }
  
  body {
    @apply antialiased text-gray-800;
  }

  h1 {
    @apply text-4xl md:text-6xl font-bold;
  }

  h2 {
    @apply text-3xl md:text-4xl font-bold;
  }

  h3 {
    @apply text-2xl md:text-3xl font-bold;
  }

  h4 {
    @apply text-xl font-bold;
  }
}

@layer components {
  .container {
    @apply max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8;
  }

  .btn {
    @apply inline-flex items-center justify-center px-6 py-3 border border-transparent rounded-lg font-semibold transition-all duration-200;
  }

  .btn-primary {
    @apply btn bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500;
  }

  .btn-secondary {
    @apply btn bg-secondary text-white hover:bg-secondary-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-secondary-500;
  }

  .btn-outline {
    @apply btn border-2 border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2 focus:ring-primary-500;
  }

  .card {
    @apply bg-white rounded-xl shadow-lg p-6 transition duration-300 hover:shadow-xl;
  }

  .input {
    @apply w-full px-4 py-2 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary-500 focus:border-transparent;
  }
}

@layer utilities {
  .text-gradient {
    @apply bg-clip-text text-transparent bg-gradient-to-r from-primary to-secondary;
  }
}

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
module.exports = {
  content: [
    "./dist/**/*.html",
    "./src/pages/**/*.{html,js}",
    "./src/components/**/*.{html,js}"
  ],
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        primary: {
          DEFAULT: '#1E3A8A',
          50: '#E6EAF4',
          100: '#C2CDE4',
          200: '#7D93C9',
          300: '#4A69B1',
          400: '#2C4B9E',
          500: '#1E3A8A',
          600: '#162C6B',
          700: '#0F1D4D',
          800: '#070F2E',
          900: '#02040F'
        },
        secondary: {
          DEFAULT: '#7C3AED',
          50: '#F3EEFE',
          100: '#E4D7FD',
          200: '#C7ACFB',
          300: '#AA81F9',
          400: '#8D56F7',
          500: '#7C3AED',
          600: '#5F15DA',
          700: '#4810A7',
          800: '#310B74',
          900: '#1A0641'
        },
        success: {
          DEFAULT: '#059669',
          50: '#E6F6F1',
          100: '#B3E6D9',
          200: '#80D6C1',
          300: '#4DC6A9',
          400: '#1AB691',
          500: '#059669',
          600: '#047857',
          700: '#035A45',
          800: '#023C33',
          900: '#011E21'
        }
      },
      fontFamily: {
        sans: ['Inter', 'system-ui', 'sans-serif']
      },
      animation: {
        'fade-in': 'fadeIn 0.5s ease-in-out',
        'slide-up': 'slideUp 0.5s ease-out',
        'slide-down': 'slideDown 0.5s ease-out'
      },
      keyframes: {
        fadeIn: {
          '0%': { opacity: '0' },
          '100%': { opacity: '1' }
        },
        slideUp: {
          '0%': { transform: 'translateY(20px)', opacity: '0' },
          '100%': { transform: 'translateY(0)', opacity: '1' }
        },
        slideDown: {
          '0%': { transform: 'translateY(-20px)', opacity: '0' },
          '100%': { transform: 'translateY(0)', opacity: '1' }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  plugins: [],
  // TODO: Review and optimize Tailwind CSS configuration
}
